Read in main data set from fivethirtyeight github repository on police killings.
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
require(RCurl)

raw_data = read_csv(
        "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fivethirtyeight/data/master/police-killings/police_killings.csv"
      )
```
